snippet: President Obama said the focus of a budget deal in Congress should now be on targeted spending cuts and changes to the tax code.
lead_paragraph: President Obama said the focus of a budget deal in Congress should now be on targeted spending cuts and changes to the tax code.

headline.seo: Obama Says Loopholes Could Factor in Budget Deal
headline.main: Tax Loopholes May Be Next, Obama Says
headline.print_headline: Tax Loopholes May Be Next, Obama Says
